channel.title: Need Serious Help!
channel.description:
Ok guys, this is what is happening. I've had my computer since 2005, actually it's a HP Pavilion m7100e. I've haven't really played any games on it for a long time. Then one day I go to play Maple Story and it crashes like 10 minutes in. Then I downloaded Combat Arms and that did the same thing. Soon enough, I found out that any games I play on my computer crashes 5 to 10 minutes in. When the games crash, the screen just freezes and I can't do anything. I cant even do CTRL + ALT + DELETE. So I end up having to restart my computer.
After hours of researching and testing, I found out my gpu chip starts to overheat when I play games and after it gets to it's highest temperature, the game crashes and the computer restarts. I found this out with SpeedFan, which is a program that shows your gpu current temperature.
To fix all this I got a program called RivaTuner. Which can adjust your fans speed. I used this guy's tutorial to try adjusting my fans speed accordingly-> [url]https://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?p=9027555[/url] Now the problem is when I click customize and then click on the chip icon my screen pops up with this. ![](upload://rRiPccRBYjUngTdVyzWrqHlGDMs.jpeg) When it's supposed to be this. [img]https://img152.imageshack.us/img152/8895/6rivaselectenablelowlevfe0.jpg[/img] Can someone please help me get to that screen above :frowning: Thanx! And yes that is Daxter in the background :slight_smile:

item.title: Need Serious Help!
item.dc:creator: GravityGun
item.description:
Alright, i’m sorry deathmonkey7. It was kinda late last night when I posted that. And Maverix26. I do but games. For the xbox360 and that’s about it. Becuase my computer sucks at playing games unless I get a better graphics card. Right now I have the geoforce 6600. Actually looking at my shelf I can see Oblivion, Half-Life 1 anthology, (half-life 2 is on steam) Portal, TF and TF2 bunch of Star Wars games, Battlefield 2, and topping it off with Guild Wars! Once black mesa releases then that will be in there to

item.title: Need Serious Help!
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
GravityGun:

woo woo woo woo! Lets cut to the chase. Yes, I used to play maplestory, in fact, I use to be addicted. But seriously, you’re not a true gamer unless you have played maplestory. So shove that non masculinity in your face deathmonkey7. But that was a long time ago, like when I was 12.
Nexon.net has produced soo many awesome games. Combat Arms anyone? And their new game Vindictus looks AMAZING! https://vindictus.nexon.net/

Also, I just started playing A Alliance Of Valiant Arms (free fps) if anyone would like to play wit me just send me a pm.
AND
If anybody is familiar with minecraft, I would love to join a game with you Just send me a pm to.
BTW- this is the best minecraft griefer ever! (not promoting griefing)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9mEOp_Waebc&feature=related

Good job misreading my post. Fnoigy said maplestory is fun maybe if you have issues, I retorted with or it is fun if you’re not insecure about your masculinity. Meaning you can have fun with it if you are secure in your manliness.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Serious Help!
item.dc:creator: Zageron
item.description:
I am going to assume that the GPU is really old.
You mind saying what GPU you have?

Run > dxdiag

Click Display, screenshot the screen and upload.

Thanks, and you’re welcome.

Oh, and as for trusting the Black Mesa community… from what I’m seen in my year of lurking, this is generally a very bad idea. Don’t trust too much that is said here.
There is too much fail and troll spawn.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Serious Help!
item.dc:creator: GravityGun
item.description:
Before I begin I would really like to thank sersoft and Zageron. Sersoft solved my problem and zageron provided an in depth explanation. I never knew about Ntune until sersoft told me and when I downloaded I performed a system test that configured my computer clocks and fan speeds and such. Now my gpu is down almost 20 degrees! which is good becuase my games arn’ t crashing! I can always trust the black mesa community, thanks guys! BTW im typing all this on my phone.

ohh ya, if anybody whants to play minecraft i’llbe hosting a server on tuesday when i get back from vacation

Read full topic

item.title: Need Serious Help!
item.dc:creator: Zageron
item.description:
Extra airflow is always good. Chances are with this issue, there wasn’t even a fan on the chip to begin with. (It IS hot right now, depending on where you are, so when it cools off your problems may subside.)

Read full topic

item.title: Need Serious Help!
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
sorry i automatically assumed that OP had an nvidia because of rivatuner

i think at this point the best thing to do is apply an extra fan around the gpu/northbrige area

Read full topic

item.title: Need Serious Help!
item.dc:creator: Zageron
item.description:
The screen you’re showing is for the bottom customize button. The screen you have shows up on very simple video cards, usually computers with on-board controllers versus physical cards.

The screen you want is on the first customize button, follow by the chip button. It should display low level fan control.

A quick question if that didn’t help, do you have a physical video card? (ATI, nVidia?) It doesn’t look like it, and if that’s the case I would suggest going out and purchasing a cheap card. ($50~$120)

Let me know if I can help you with anything else.

Read full topic
